Honestly you guys should go support this movie instead of pirating it. It's really underrated and you can go to your local dollar theater and pay next to nothing to see great quality.

@ Soda God - be a pirate, or don't be a pirate.  I went to see this film in the cinema on the strength of what the torrent represented.  Don't just assume all downloaders dont go to the cinema or buy the dvd.  If anything, it's a try-before-I-buy service.

EPIC EPIC MOVIE!!!

I'm glad I actually went to the cinema and paid to see this one, well worth the money.  I got that same feeling I had the first time I saw the matrix, it just blows your mind.  You will have never seen a movie like this before.

I'm usually a believer in the "try before you buy" idea but was glad I saw this one in the cinema first.
